transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji Pawan Kumar ji baat kar rahe hain Balaji Murti. Ji ji.
Customer: Ji. Ji Pawan ji namaskar Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha hun senior manager IndiaMART aapki sahayata ke liye.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji sir actually abhi aapka feedback aaya hua tha.
Executive: Apna jo hai na leads vagaira bole the aur to bhai usi ke liye call kiya hua tha kya exactly issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Sir aajkal kya hai ki lead nahi aati hai hamare paas.
Executive: Lead nahi aati hai aapke paas?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Aur usme agar search karenge to hi aayegi bigar search ke nahi aa rahi jaise pahle aati thi na.
Customer: Bigar search ke aa jati thi pahle to.
Executive: Search karne pe ka option sir isiliye diya hua hai na ki agar in the case nahi dikh rahi hai to aap jo hai na manually search karke consume kar lijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi pahle to search karna hi nahi padta tha na ab search karna pad raha hai lead ko pata nahi.
Executive: Baat pahle aur baad ki nahi hai wo option banaya isiliye gaya tha ki agar kisi bhi reason ki vajah se man lijiye requirement kam hai ya jo hai na kisi bhi reason ki vajah se agar jo hai na nahi bhi dikh pa rahi hai to aapke paas search ka option isiliye diya gaya hai ki aap usko manually search karke consume kar sakte hain.
Customer: Bhauji dekho meri baat suno nahi to hum itna padha likha.
Customer: Search karba ko hum pe to hum pe aave na hai bilkul bhi.
Customer: Thik hai hum to jaise agar hamare suno jaise hamare paas aa jaaye to hum khol le lead nahi to Jai Siya Ram hai bas.
Executive: Sir dekho aisa hai baat Pawan ji ye hai aap online portal agar use kar rahe hain agar nahi bhi aata hai to sikhna to padega na sir bina sikhe to nahi hone wala.
Customer: Nahi nahi search karne ki jarurat hi kahan padti hai usme.
Customer: Pahle to nahi padi thi isse pahle.
Executive: Baat baat jarurat ki nahi hai baat jarurat ki nahi hai baat jo hai na competition ki hoti hai.
Executive: Agar mere paas number of supplier jyada hai lead.
Customer: Are fir usme galat chhid jata hai humse meri baat suno fir aapki company wale ye kahte hain aapne to isko galat daba diya aapne isko galat kar diya.
Executive: Galat daba diya to tab hoga na jab aap jo hai na check kare bhai ek chiz bataiye lead mere samne dikh rahi hai requirement mere samne dikh rahi hai product ka naam mere samne dikh raha hai city mere samne dikh rahi hai to galat kaise dab jayega?
Customer: Yaar bhauji vahi galat kar de fir nahi kal galat to aapki taraf se kar de wo fir pato mere paas kabhi juta ki lead de wala ja kabhi kuch ki.
Customer: Ya baat mare samajh mein nahi aati.
Executive: Jab tak jab tak jab tak aap jo hai na lead consume nahi karenge tab tak sir aisa koi ek chiz bataiye sir itna kya IndiaMART ko nahi dikh raha ki koi murti banata hai usko jute ki lead hum kyon denge?
Executive: Aap khud soch ke dekho na.
Executive: Matlab ye to hame bhi dikh raha hai na ki aap kis product mein deal karte ho aap agar jo hai na sir upar murti karke search karoge to juta kaise aa jayega?
Customer: Bhauji aayi hui hai mere paas mein thik hai ab aap to clear nahi hai wo.
Customer: Fir?
Executive: Ab aap kaisi baatein karte ho sir agar samne man lo koi irrelevant lead dikh bhi rahi hai jo aapke kam ki nahi hai to aapko leni kyon hai wo?
Customer: Nahi le raha na usme main.
Executive: Ha to bas khatam baat ab wo dikhne se matlab thodi hota hai dikh rahi hai dikh rahi hai nahi usko aapne lena nahi hai bas.
Customer: Nahi main to kholun bhi na.
Executive: Ha aap sirf wo lead pe click karo jo lead aapke liye relevant aapko lagti hai jo nahi relevant lagti hai usko chhod do dikh rahi hai dikhne do koi dikkat nahi hai usme aapka koi usme nuksan nahi hai jab tak aap us pe click nahi karenge tab tak koi nuksan nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai na aap manually jo hai na search kar liya kare.
Customer: Dena hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Han ji manually Pawan ji search kar liya karo aur jo chiz aapke kam ki nahi hai us pe click mat kiya karo bas itna sa logic hai usme koi itna rocket science nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai ji baki ye number aap save kar lo thik hai aap koi bhi agar issue rahta hai aap directly mujhe call kar liya karo.
Customer: Number na na na main call nahi na kar paun.
Executive: Nahi to aap ek chiz batao sir aise bhi to aap kisi na kisi ko customer care pe call kar hi rahe ho na.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Pahle unke paas jata hai ticket fir mere paas aata hai usse badhiya directly aap mere ko call kar lo.
Executive: Kiske paas?
Executive: Aap customer care pe pahle call karte ho fir wo ticket vahan open hota hai then wo jo hai na hamare paas aata hai.
Executive: Right to wo chiz jo hai na aap directly bhi to hame call kar sakte ho.
Customer: Ab wo to complaint dal di bhai sahab main yahi use dali main ki agar ya ko koi solution hai to thik hai na hai to koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Nahi wo dekho baat solution ki nahi hai baat ye hai ki portal sir jo bana hai wo aapke akele ke liye nahi sabke liye ek jaisa bana hai ab thodi to dekhiye effort dalne padte hain client ko matlab aap agar jaise aapne bola ki nahi ji bhai jo hai na hum nahi utna jo hai na samajhte hain ya jante hain to sir dekhiye sikhna to padega na agar online portal pe kam karna hai.
Customer: Meri baat to sahi kah raha hai.
Executive: To wo vali chiz hai sir ab har chiz to hum client ke hisab se mold nahi kar sakte na ek jo hai na sir standard portal bana hua hai us hisab se kam hote hain baki client bhi use kar rahe hain aap bhi use kariye nahi aata hai to aap jo hai na sikh lijiye aur ki kafi chize to aapko already hamari team ne guide kar di hai kaise kya jo hai na use karna hai to aap utna use kariye.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Chalo karenge jaise bhi jaise bhi dhakka lagayenge abhi is saal.
Executive: Baki is saal dekho is saal to abhi nu kara liya agli saal ki agli saal dekhenge.
Executive: Wo dekho sir wo aapka choice hai wo usme to sir dekho koi aapko force nahi karega wo agli saal aapko karana hai.
Customer: Force to nahi karte post to aapki company wale khub raat din phone karte hain yaar.
Executive: Are sir to kam hai hamara wo lena nahi lena decision to aapka hai paisa to aapka hai na sir.
Customer: Haan ye batao.
Customer: Ye ye padi to hai desh bhar ki.
Executive: Thik hai ji sir baki agar kuch bhi rahta hai to aap directly mere ko call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Customer receives irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to manually search leads.

- Executive advised to ignore irrelevant leads.

- Executive shared direct contact number for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, search, manual search, irrelevant leads
